objects

Class AnimatedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • objects.DisplayableObject
      • objects.AnimatedObject

  • public abstract class AnimatedObject
extends DisplayableObject
    Abstract class to be inherited by all animated objects to be displayed in Scene

    Contains abstract DisplayableObject.display() method that must be overloaded. DisplayableObject.display() is called from a parent #Scene.

    Contains abstract update(float) method that must be overloaded. update(float dT) is called from a parent #Scene.

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    wil
    See Also:
    DisplayableObject

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimatedObject(Scene parent)
      Constructor for AnimatedObject that sets up link to rendering window commands.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnimatedObject

        public AnimatedObject(Scene parent)
        Constructor for AnimatedObject that sets up link to rendering window commands.

        Abstract class so constructor should only be called by sub-class via super(DisplayableObject.parent)

        Parameters:
        parent - Your Scene.
        See Also:
        AnimatedObject
